DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study compare efficacy iron ( 12.5 mg ferrous sulfate ) placebo give 6 month prevent elevation blood lead concentration child 6-9 month age .
DOC.criteria: Infants include gestational age > 36 week , birth weight > 2500g , chronic illness , blood lead concentration < 10 mcg/dL , hemoglobin > 9 g/dL , zinc protoporphyrin > 90 mmol/mol heme Mothers include 18 year old
